verses.verse: Masters <S%G2962><s%>, render <S%G3930><s%> unto <S%G1401><s%> your servants <S%G1401><s%> that which is just <S%G1342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> equal <S%G2471><s%>; knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> a Master <S%G2962><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>.
Continue <S%G4342><s%> stedfastly in <S%G1722><s%> prayer <S%G4335><s%>, watching <S%G1127><s%> therein <S%G846><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%>;

withal <S%G260><s%> praying <S%G4336><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> us <S%G2257><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> may open <S%G455><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> a door <S%G2374><s%> for the word <S%G3056><s%>, to speak <S%G2980><s%> the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>, for <S%G1223><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I am <S%G1210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in bonds <S%G1210><s%>;
that <S%G2443><s%> I may make <S%G5319><s%> it <S%G846><s%> manifest <S%G5319><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> I <S%G3165><s%> ought <S%G1163><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%>.
Walk <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> toward <S%G4314><s%> them that are <S%G3588><s%> without <S%G1854><s%>, redeeming <S%G1805><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%>.

Let <S%G741><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> speech <S%G3056><s%> be always <S%G3842><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%>, seasoned <S%G741><s%> with salt <S%G217><s%>, that ye may know <S%G1492><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> ye <S%G5209><s%> ought <S%G1163><s%> to answer <S%G611><s%> each <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1520><s%>.

All <S%G3956><s%> my <S%G1691><s%> affairs <S%G2596><s%> shall <S%G1107><s%> Tychicus <S%G5190><s%> make known <S%G1107><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, the beloved <S%G27><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> minister <S%G1249><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fellow-servant <S%G4889><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>:

whom <S%G3739><s%> I have sent3992, 4314 you <S%G5209><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> this very <S%G846><s%> purpose <S%G5124><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> ye may know <S%G1097><s%> our <S%G5216><s%> state <S%G4012><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that he may comfort <S%G3870><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%>;

together with <S%G4862><s%> Onesimus <S%G3682><s%>, the faithful <S%G4103><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> one of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>. They shall make known <S%G1107><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> are done here <S%G5602><s%>.

Aristarchus <S%G708><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> fellow-prisoner <S%G4869><s%> saluteth <S%G782><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Mark <S%G3138><s%>, the cousin <S%G431><s%> of Barnabas <S%G921><s%> (touching <S%G4012><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> ye received <S%G2983><s%> commandments <S%G1785><s%>; if <S%G1437><s%> he come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, receive <S%G1209><s%> him <S%G846><s%>),

and <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> that is called <S%G3004><s%> Justus <S%G2459><s%>, who are <S%G5607><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the circumcision <S%G4061><s%>: these <S%G3778><s%> only <S%G3441><s%> are my fellow-workers <S%G4904><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, men that <S%G3748><s%> have been <S%G1096><s%> a comfort <S%G3931><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%>.

Epaphras <S%G1889><s%>, who is <S%G3588><s%> one of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, a servant <S%G1401><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G782><s%>, saluteth you <S%G5209><s%>, always <S%G3842><s%> striving <S%G75><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his prayers <S%G4335><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> ye may stand <S%G2476><s%> perfect <S%G5046><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fully assured <S%G4137><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I bear <S%G3140><s%> him <S%G846><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> he hath <S%G2192><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> labor <S%G2205><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> for them <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Laodicea <S%G2993><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> for them <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Hierapolis <S%G2404><s%>.
490 <S%G3065><s%>, the beloved <S%G27><s%> physician <S%G2395><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Demas <S%G1214><s%> salute <S%G782><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>.

Salute <S%G782><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%> that are in <S%G1722><s%> Laodicea <S%G2993><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Nymphas <S%G3564><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%> that is in <S%G2596><s%> their <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> this <S%G3588><s%> epistle <S%G1992><s%> hath been read <S%G314><s%> among <S%G3844><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, cause <S%G4160><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> it be read <S%G314><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%> of the Laodiceans <S%G2994><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> read <S%G314><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> epistle from <S%G1537><s%> Laodicea <S%G2993><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> say <S%G2036><s%> to Archippus <S%G751><s%>, Take heed to <S%G991><s%> the ministry <S%G1248><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> thou hast received <S%G3880><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> thou fulfil <S%G4137><s%> it <S%G846><s%>.

The salutation <S%G783><s%> of me <S%G1699><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> mine own hand <S%G5495><s%>. Remember <S%G3421><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> bonds <S%G1199><s%>. Grace <S%G5485><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>.
